CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function 'prepare' is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly appends the '_html' parameter to 'tooltip_div' without sanitizing or encoding it. If '_html' contains malicious scripts, they will be executed when the tooltip is displayed. This can lead to various attacks such as stealing sensitive data, session hijacking, defacement of the website, etc.
